title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, June 2, 2021
description: Novelist and poet Thomas Hardy was born on this day in 1840. A risky and bold writer, his works are said to have a “painterly” quality that lends them well to becoming films.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
